00062 #include <vector>
00063 #include "indri/IndriParser.hpp"
00064 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00065 #include "lemur/string-set.h"
00066 
00067 class TextParser : public indri::Parser {
00068 public:
00069   TextParser();
00070   ~TextParser();
00071   
00072   ParsedDocument* parse( UnparsedDocument* document );
00073 
00074   void handle( UnparsedDocument* document );
00075   void setHandler( ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument>& h );
00076 
00077   void setTags( const std::vector<std::string>& include,
00078                 const std::vector<std::string>& exclude,
00079                 const std::vector<std::string>& index,
00080                 const std::vector<std::string>& metadata, 
00081                 const std::map<std::string, std::string>& conflations );
00082 
00083 protected:
00084   void writeToken(char* token);
00085   void writeToken(char *token, int start, int end);
00086   Buffer _termBuffer;
00087 
00088 private:
00089   ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument>* _handler;

00091 };
